script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_tag_sub_sub_sectors AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, s.name, s.amp_sector_id, a.sector_percentage FROM amp_activity_sector a, amp_sector s WHERE (((a.amp_sector_id = s.amp_sector_id) AND (getsectordepth(s.amp_sector_id) = 2)) AND (s.amp_sec_scheme_id IN (SELECT c.classification_id FROM amp_classification_config c WHERE ((c.name)::text = 'Tag'::text)))) ORDER BY a.amp_activity_id, s.name;
